// Forest factory
const counterForestFactory = () => new Forest({
  name: 'counter',
  value: { count: 0, history: [] },
  actions: {
    increment: function() {
      this.mutate(draft => {
        draft.count++;
        draft.history.push(`Incremented to ${draft.count}`);
      });
    }
  }
});

// React component
function Counter() {
  const [value, forest] = useForestryLocal(counterForestFactory);

  return (
    <div>
      <p>Count: {value.count}</p>
      <button onClick={forest.$.increment}>
        Increment
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}
